physical_appearance: This is a green batik dress with stand up collar. It has stripped patterns of varying designs across the panel of the dress.
sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. Beyond wedding gowns, she also designed dresses for her female relatives. This mother of the bride dress was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister, Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy). It was worn by Mrs Florence Chong at her daughter Susanâ€™s wedding in 1984.
title_text: Green Batik Dress with Stand-up Collar by Sylvia Kho nee Wong Sien Moy Green Batik Dress with Stand-up Collar
subject_terms_2: Custom-made clothing Women's clothing Kho, Sylvia, 1917- Dresses
